entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
